job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-23T17:11:50.000Z", "description": "

Responsibilities:

  • Understanding the business, payment platforms, and customer flows that generate the source data for the project
  • Analyzing and understanding the data needed for modeling and platform features
  • Cleaning the data and ensuring the validity of the data
  • Preprocessing the data (via shell scripts and a programming language such as Python, Java, Scala, etc)
  • Iteratively computing features and tuning parameters to improve the quality of the model
  • Communicating your findings to the project team and client stakeholders
  • Assisting in decision making and making recommendations on Data Science aspects of the project
  • Collaborating with key stakeholders (data scientists, engineers, risk managers, users) on the project

 

Requirements:

  • Proficient in Machine Learning (training and testing, avoiding overfitting, etc.)
  • Experience with applying machine learning techniques to predictive modeling
  • Knowledge of Big Data technologies such as Spark, Hadoop, and related platforms
  • Proficiency in Bash, Python, and either Java or Scala
  • Proficient in querying databases (Spark, PySpark, Hive, SQL, Oracle, Cassandra)
  • Experience with extracting insights from raw data and transforming them into useful features
  • Knowledge of resource monitoring and runtime optimization (both at JVM and OS level)
  • Knowledge of statistics or data visualization is a plus
  • Knowledge of tree-based algorithms (Random Forests, XGBoost, LGBM) is a plus
  • Knowledge of Deep Learning algorithms is a plus
  • Ability to communicate your findings in a clear way and prepare stakeholder presentations
  • Prior client-facing consulting experience is a plus
